definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
lit. blood vessels swell wide (idiom)/fig. one's blood runs quicker/to be excited

sentences.english: We are noodle folk. Broth runs through our veins.
sentences.chinese: 我们是做面条的，血脉里流淌着汤汁。

sentences.english: And evetually the Chinese people chose Marxism, for which is related by blood with the Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义和中国传统文化血脉是相通的。

sentences.english: For the protection of ZhongLiang blood, shaolin the monk would die rather than surrender, strive to resist.
sentences.chinese: 为保护忠良的血脉，少林众僧宁死不屈，奋力抵抗。

sentences.english: Every time I come here I can relate myself to many things.
sentences.chinese: 每次到中国来我都感到自己与许多事情血脉相连。

sentences.english: We must never sever the cultural vein of our nation.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能割断民族的文化血脉。

sentences.english: These drawer-dropping beauties in skintight leather trousers.
sentences.chinese: 这些让人血脉贲张的美人儿穿着性感的紧身皮裤。

sentences.english: You are the blood of the dragon, you can make a hat.
sentences.chinese: 你是真龙血脉，你一定能编出一顶帽子的。

sentences.english: Traditional values emphasise conventional family life and the continuation of blood lines.
sentences.chinese: 传统价值观强调的是常规的家庭生活以及血脉的延续。

sentences.english: We are part of China. Our futures are forever linked.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国一部分，血脉相连，荣辱与共。

sentences.english: We have to nanytime bisect the cultural attitude of our nation.
sentences.chinese: 咱们不能切断民族的文化血脉。

sentences.english: XT in large dosage could also increase the brain weight in scopolamine models.
sentences.chinese: 血脉通大剂量还明显提高东莨菪碱模型的脑重指数。

sentences.english: His son is the only remaining survivor of the royal bloodline.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子凯尔萨斯王子是这个皇家血统的最后血脉。

sentences.english: Your heart starts to beat a little faster, your blood starts flowing quicker, and your breath gets shorter.
sentences.chinese: 你的心跳加速，血脉贲张，呼吸也急促起来。

sentences.english: Each of your blood will be inside my body, effort connected.
sentences.chinese: 你的每个血脉，都会在我的身体里面，心血相连。

sentences.english: Blood is thicker than water. Our veins are bounded .
All things are connected like the blood which unites one family.
sentences.chinese: 世间万物皆血脉相连，亲如一家。

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
dragon's vein, terrain that looks like a dragon
